titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the George Washington University Club records, "1986-2000 RG0138
titlestmt.author: Special Collections Research Center, The George Washington University

publicationstmt.publisher: Special Collections Research Center, The George Washington University

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2022-01-11 11:53:14 -0500.

repository.corpname: Special Collections Research Center, The George Washington University

did.abstract: This collection contains the records of the memberhsip committee of the George Washington University Club dating from 1986-2000 with the bulk dates 1986-1988.
did.physloc: Materials may be stored off-site, and may require additional retrieval time. Please contact the Special Collections Research Center for more information.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Some material may be copyrighted or restricted. It is the patron's obligation to determine and satisfy copyright or other case restrictions when publishing or otherwise distributing materials found in the collections.

bioghist.head: Historical note
bioghist.p: For the last years of its existence the club was located at 1918 F St NW. An earlier location was in the Marvin Center. The George Washington University Club began in 1970 with the purpose to promote the educational, intellectual, professional, research, cultural, social and recreational activities of The George Washington University through its faculty, administrative staff, students, alumni and friends.

The Club has gone through significant management changes throughout its history. In 2003, although still a membership club the University reduced the cost of membership and included late-night hours with the goal of making the club more accessible to the GW community and specifically students.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection contains minutes, agendas, brochures, memos, surveys and other documents that tell the story of the George Washington University Club from 1986-2000 with the bulk dates of 1986-1988. These records are primarily from the club's memership committee.
The first folder in box 1 was originally in a binder titled Membership Committee Kia Sechrist. The other files in box 1 were removed from one large black binder.
Please note there is additional University Club records in RG0002 the University Presidents papers. Please ask staff for assistance.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Please cite unpublished materials in the following way:
Please provide the title and date of item, catalog number (if applicable it will be found written on the folder), name of the collection, name of the repository, and location of the repository.

Example: James Oglethorpe to the Trustees, 13 January 1876, RG0001 Series 1, Box 4, Folder 3. Records of the Board of Trustees, Special Collections Research Center, Gelman Library, The George Washington University, Washington, D.C.
